scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=COVERAGE TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_HTML=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$(pwd)/ meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --raw-logs && cat .coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js || true
scripts.coverage:unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=COVERAGE TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_HTML=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=%cd%\ meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --raw-logs
scripts.coverage:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=COVERAGE COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_VERBOSE=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=%cd%\ TEST_WATCH=1 meteor test --driver-package cultofcoders:mocha --raw-logs
scripts.coverage:unit:full: npm run-script coverage:unit && npm run-script coverage:coverall
